description.value: When enemies cluster together, you can release all your accumulated elemental energy in one explosive discharge.

prerequisites.other: Pneuma Strike (any element), any elemental Mastery 5

system.benefits:
Once per short rest, can spend 6 Energy to release a devastating elemental burst in a 15-foot cone:

  • Choose one element you have Pneuma Strike for
  • Make weaving check for that element
  • Creatures in area make [[/save type=reflex]] (opposed by your weaving roll)
    • 2 successes: [[/damage 3d8 type=elemental]] damage
    • 1 success: [[/damage 2d8 type=elemental]] damage
    • 0 successes: [[/damage 1d8 type=elemental]] damage (lose opposed check)
